name: JUST A COPY
description:
Made for trijam 206 in 3 hours 

Move left and right with A and D, and jump with W. This also works with arrow keys. You can also press space to create a copy, which respawns you, and creates a copy of you which perfroms exactly the actions you did.

Sorry this game's kinda short, I was gonna add several levels, but I ended up spending way to long messing arround with shaders and the glow effect, so I ran out of time. Honestly still not too happy with how it looks, but it's good enough for 3 hours work.

Have fun :)

Known bugs:

- The copies can push you around, and bonk you through the world if they jump on you. This is because I implemented the copies in the stupidest possible way.
